original_text: Then Solomon stood before the altar of the Lord in front of the whole assembly of Israel, spread out his hands toward heaven
korean_text: 솔로몬이 여호와의 제단 앞에서 이스라엘의 온 회중과 마주서서 하늘을 향하여 손을 펴고

sentences.original_text: before the altar of the Lord
in front of the whole assembly of Israel
spread out his hands toward heaven
